price: Then he[6] called her from beneath her, “Do not grieve; your Lord has provided a stream beneath you.
arabic: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحۡتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحۡزَنِي قَدۡ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحۡتَكِ سَرِيّٗا
footnotes: [6] i.e., the archangel Gabriel or the baby.
